subject: fix(query): move AND/OR toggle from per-filter-row to step header
body:
The AND/OR connector buttons between filter rows all shared the same
step.logic value, so toggling any one changed all of them. This confused
users into thinking the buttons were independent per-filter-pair.

Fix: Replace per-row interactive connector buttons with a single
"Match all" / "Match any" toggle in the step header (only shown when
2+ filters exist). Between filter rows, a non-interactive AND/OR label
still shows the current logic for visual context.
